page.title: 14A Watford Mum's Monday.
page.content: Mum gets up at about 7.15am and has breakfast with Dad. She then makes the beds and tidies up and helps my sister to get organised for school. Then she drags me out of bed and gets ready for work. She leaves at 8.45am to go to our local Infant School where she is a Welfare Assistant. At noon she comes home, usually doing some shopping on the way and gets lunch for herself and me. Then she has a rest and goes back to work. She gets home at 3.20pm and either reads the newspaper, plays game with me, relaxes, or does housework until 6.15pm when she gets dinner for the whole family. Afterwards she relaxes and watches television until my bedtime at 9.30pm. Then she chats with Dad until they go to bed at about 11.00pm.
